example.text: The GOP's Child Deportation Act is an anti-immigrant MAGA wish list—cruel, extreme, and unworkable. I strongly opposed it. There's a better path. Yesterday, [[user]] introduced the US Citizenship Act, a humane, common-sense approach to modernize our immigration system. [[url]]
